text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm… is this your current practice
plan? … I see, I see.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Oh, please don't play games with me.
This isn't a real plan, is it?

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
I mean you, trainer. You're still
hiding some grand self-sacrificial
plan aren't you…!?
